articles.title: SARS postpones answering Steenhuisen's PAIA request on Ramaphosa's Phala Phala dollars - News24
articles.description: The South African Revenue Service has postponed telling DA leader John Steenhuisen whether it will provide him with the declaration of US dollars by the Sudanese businessman who bought game from President Cyril Ramaphosa's Phala Phala farm.

articles.description: Lady Du is Amapiano royalty and also has a love for cool cars, the songwriter recently showed off her customised BMW 325i on Instagram.
articles.content:
